== New Hampshire LoCo Team ==

This page hsa been derived from Colorado's LoCo page.  Thank Colorado!

The New Hampshire Local Community Team is '''not''' meant to replace our local LUGs but rather enhance their overall experience by having a dedicated place to discuss, contribute, and gain support from local Ubuntu users.

=== Joining ===

If you are interested in joining our team please apply on our <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com/NewHampshireTeam/Members|Members Page]]</nowiki> and then subscribe to the mailing list below.  All that is required is residency in or near New Hampshire and a desire to see Ubuntu grow.

 
=== What We Do ===
* Educate the public about Ubuntu
* Supply Ubuntu (CDs & CD images)
* Support Ubuntu Locally
* Conduct outreach programs
* Ubuntu Activism
* Partner with local businesses and Educational institutions to further Ubuntu

=== Communications Channels ===
* '''Mailing list''': <nowiki>[[http://lists.nh.ub.untu.net|Mailing list]]</nowiki>
* '''Website''': <nowiki>[[http://nhub.untu.net/|http://nhub.untu.net/]]</nowiki> 
* '''Forum''': <nowiki>[[http://newhampshire.ubuntuforums.org|http://newhampshire.ubuntuforums.org]]</nowiki>
* '''IRC Channel''': irc://irc.freenode.net/#ubuntu-newhampshire
